General.Name: RomReal Limited
General.Description: RomReal Limited, together with its subsidiaries, engages in property investment and development in Romania. The company owns a portfolio of properties primarily in Constanta and Ovidiu. Its plots are primarily suited for residential and commercial developments. As of December 31, 2022, the company had a land bank of 219,727 square meters. RomReal Limited was founded in 2005 and is based in Hamilton, Bermuda.

2.Name: Mr. Adrian  Cristea
2.Title: Chief Exec. Officer of Westhouse Group
